title: The Talk Show: ‘I Don’t Know How to Read’
content:
For your holiday weekend listening enjoyment, a new episode of America’s favorite 3-star podcast. Special guest: the one and only Joanna Stern.

Brought to you by these fine sponsors:

  • SongPop Party: Exclusively on Apple Arcade, play the world’s favorite music trivia game.
  • Memberful: Monetize your passion with membership.
  • LinkedIn Jobs: Find and hire the right person. Your first job post is free.
  • Squarespace: Everything you need to grow online. Use code talkshow for 10% off your first order.
 ★
author: John Gruber
